titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PERCENTAGE OF NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE LOCAL APPEALS RESULTING IN ELIGIBILITY - Description

div.p: PERCENTAGE OF NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE LOCAL APPEALS RESULTING IN ELIGIBILITY is the derived percentage of NHS Continuing Healthcare Local Appeals that resulted in full or partial NHS Continuing Healthcare eligibility.

PERCENTAGE OF NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE LOCAL APPEALS RESULTING IN ELIGIBILITY is derived from NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE LOCAL APPEALS COMPLETED and NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE LOCAL APPEALS RESULTING IN ELIGIBILITY.
